member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.TrackLayer.Contracts.Layer.ITrackLayerViewModel.GeoFilterBufferFactor
member.summary: By default, only tracks within current viewport are fetched from service. The width and height of current view are multiplied by "GeoFilterBufferFactor" before fetching tracks. By increasing this value to >1, tracks outside current view will be fetched. Recommended range is 1.0 to 1.5

member.name: P:TPG.GeoFramework.TrackLayer.Contracts.ITrackServiceSynchronizer.GeoFilterBufferFactor
member.summary: This scale factor is applied to geo extents to fetch tracks from larger or smaller area than default (typically geo area covered by screen) Latitude extents and longitude extents are multiplied by this factor.
